title: New: Ben Khan – Drive (Part 1)
body:
Several months on from the whole **Jai Paul** fiasco, and still no real word on when we’ll be hearing new material from the elusive Londoner.

Ready to step up to the plate is fellow capital city inhabitant **Ben Khan**, wowing with his debut track, _Drive (Part 1)_. Choppy synths, breathy vocals and a groove Prince would die for, Khan is a twenty year old with an extremely bright future. So it’s no Jasmine, but hey, what is? Check out his debut cut below, or watch the raunchy [video here](http://youtu.be/YN-stfOQtWg).
